#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cmath>
#include<cstring>
using namespace std;
#define s second
int n,i,j,x,cs;
long long s;
int B[100001];
pair<int,int> A[100001];
int main()
{
  scanf("%d",&cs);
  while(cs--)
  {
    scanf("%d",&n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
      scanf("%d",&A[i].first);
      A[i].s=i;
    }
    sort(A,A+n);
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
    {
      scanf("%d",&x);
      B[A[i].s]=x;
    }
    for(i=s=0;i<n;i++)
      for(j=i+1;j<n;j++)
        s+=B[i]>B[j];
    cout<<s<<"\n";
  }
  return 0;
}
